structure.unit: Chapter 17B METROPOLITAN MIAMI-DADE COUNTY DEMOLITION OF UNINHABITABLE STRUCTURES ORDINANCE

text.section:
Sec. 17B-12. Final order.
The order to demolish an uninhabitable structure as provided for in shall automatically become a final order authorizing demolition in the event that no written appeal from the notice is received by the Minimum Housing Appeals Board twenty (20) days after the date of posting.
